result.title: Public report on the metal hydride compressor
result.description: This report includes a presentation of the metal hydride compressor, with the description of the core technology used, its main features, its advantages and drawbacks, its performance as well as selected pictures and illustrations. Information from D4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 4.4, 4.5 and 4.6 will be gathered and put at the disposal of the FCH-JU for public dissemination. This report will be also the basis of the dissemination performed by the project partners.
